package.name: staubli_val3_driver

description.p: ROS-Industrial VAL3 driver for the Staubli RX160 (and variants).

This package contains the ROS-I compliant driver, implemented in VAL3 language, and launch files required to communicate with Staubli 6-axis robot arms. This driver has been tested with the Staubli CS8 controller and the RX160L robot arm.

Before using the provided driver and any of the configuration files included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Murilo Martins (Ocado Technology)
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
